---
title: "Gráficos em ggplot part.4"
author: "Yuri combinação com aula do Prof"
format: html

execute: 
  freeze: auto
  cache: true
  warning: false
---

::: {.cell hash='aula7_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_3cd0e4de8bfe01c1557967580ef005b0'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)

mofo <- read_excel("dados-diversos.xlsx", "mofo")
```
:::


## Gráfico de Colunas:


::: {.cell hash='aula7_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_81b8256c40274c9692820a0cb6008113'}

```{.r .cell-code}
mofo |> 
  ggplot(aes(treat, yld))+
  geom_col()+
  facet_wrap(~study)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula7_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## Histograma e boxplot :


::: {.cell hash='aula7_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_da128bc03b2f17ce19d3c383e9941011'}

```{.r .cell-code}
h <- mofo |> 
  ggplot(aes(scl))+
  geom_histogram(bins = 10)

b <- mofo |> 
  ggplot(aes(scl))+
  geom_boxplot()
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='aula7_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_a2bcf9a335dc3b8cc0e8a81d033d130e'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(patchwork)
h / b
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula7_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='aula7_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_c2a86080bf233c6672bf7446b45c3df5'}

```{.r .cell-code}
mofo2 <- mofo
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='aula7_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_3e15ef6a9bfaffb79ebb68cf2def037d'}

```{.r .cell-code}
h2 <- mofo2 |> 
  ggplot(aes(yld))+
  geom_histogram(bins = 10)
h2
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula7_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
h / h2
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula7_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-2.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='aula7_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-7_5136460d2fae0d167ca74392b7f7bee2'}

```{.r .cell-code}
survey <- read_excel("dados-diversos.xlsx", "survey")

survey |> 
  filter(state == "RS") |> 
  count(species, residue) |> 
  arrange(n) |> 
  rename(res = residue) |> 
  mutate(n_class = case_when(
          n < 30 ~ "baixa",
          TRUE ~ "Alta"))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 4 × 4
  species res         n n_class
  <chr>   <chr>   <int> <chr>  
1 Fspp    corn       22 baixa  
2 Fspp    soybean    26 baixa  
3 Fgra    corn      147 Alta   
4 Fgra    soybean   255 Alta   
```
:::
:::
